reviewText: Loved it loved it. This principal and staff did they're absolute best and went out their call of duty to save the children. Very moving and touching. In the end most of the staff contracts were not renewed. What a shame.
I've taught high school and found this especially interesting.  Some things have changed, but some things have not. There's good and bad in all things, right. An eyeopener.

An honest look at the trenches and what it's like to live in a school reform school. Live with minimal resources and understaffing.
At the end we lost a strong leader and several staff and children.
